Angleen prasad:

CEO who set live TV is a brand new videogames on-demand platform for the 21st-generation connected living room. An entire gaming eco-system that is going to allow consumers who have an Intel-based next-generation box – such as a set-top box or a Smart phone – to be able to access videogames through a highly fun and user-friendly interface with a variety of flexible business model options in order to access gaming for the broad relative demographic.

Additionally, some phone, such as Wireless, have decided to disable Google Wallet on phones they are shipping. Other phone, which are part of a mobile wallet joint venture called , are expected to follow suit, effectively limiting access for many U.S. consumers.

More than six months after hosting a flashy launch event, the business may be getting a lot harder than it originally looked.
